patterns: What can i do in this server?
responses: This is a server meant for programmers and gamers alike! In particular if you are looking for a server to share your work, your in the right place. check out the projects section for more info.
You can do a lot in this server, such as ask for help on any problems you may have stumbled upon in your code, share projects, spread memez, and brag about linux configs or your wpm
